Detailed Description

Europa extension "plug-in".

This class is used to create new extensions of europa used by EuropaReactor.

Developper needs just to dervie this cklass and use the provided macros to register new constraints inside their registerComponents implementation and create one instance of this class which will then be used by any new Assembly created during its lifetime.

Author:
Conor McGann & Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>
See also:

virtual TREX::europa::SchemaPlugin::~SchemaPlugin (  )  [virtual]

Destructor.

Unregister the class from the schema singleton which result in turn in not having anymore the component registered by this class to any future Assembly

TREX::europa::SchemaPlugin::SchemaPlugin (  )  [protected]

Constructor.

virtual void TREX::europa::SchemaPlugin::registerComponents ( Assembly const &  assembly  )  [pure virtual]

New compoentnet registration.
